    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Specified by:
        getName in interface MessageDispatcher
        Returns:
        The name of this dispatcher, which must match the protocol supported by it (for a non-universal dispatcher) and the name of the message generator used to produce the message.

      • setResource

        public void setResource(String resource)
        Parameters:
        resource - The XMPP resource to use when connecting the server. This defaults to "TavernaServer".

      • setHost

        public void setHost(String service)
        Parameters:
        service - The XMPP service URL.

      • setUsername

        public void setUsername(String user)
        Parameters:
        user - The user identity to use with the XMPP service.

      • setPassword

        public void setPassword(String pass)
        Parameters:
        pass - The password to use with the XMPP service.

        @PreDestroy
public void close()

      • isAvailable

        public boolean isAvailable()
        Specified by:
        isAvailable in interface MessageDispatcher
        Returns:
        Whether this message dispatcher is actually available (fully configured, etc.)

      • dispatch

        public void dispatch(TavernaRun ignored,
                     String messageSubject,
                     String messageContent,
                     String targetParameter)
              throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: MessageDispatcher
        Dispatch a message to a recipient.
        Specified by:
        dispatch in interface MessageDispatcher
        Parameters:
        ignored - The workflow run that produced the message.
        messageSubject - The subject of the message to send.
        messageContent - The plain-text content of the message to send.
        targetParameter - A description of where it is to go.
        Throws:
        Exception - If anything goes wrong.
